amendment.description: Amendment allows a debtor to deduct public school expenses as an allowable expense under the means test and treats public and private school expenses equally.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 2 printed in H. Rept. 107-4 to allow a debtor to deduct public school expenses as an allowable expense under the means test and treats public and private school expenses equally.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
